name: Bible Bot
description: A simple but advanced Bible Bot made by Bots.DC

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string. Get it from https://telegram.me/botfather

BOT_DOMAIN.description: MUST Set this value to <yourappname>.herokuapp.com . Or the bot won't work properly.

FIREBASE.description: Set to true if you want to log users in firebase' realtime database. You have to set the other required parameters to activate this features completely.

FB_APIKEY.description: ONLY NEEDED IF `FIREBASE` IS SET TO TRUE. Get this value while creating a firebase app. Read documentation at https://github.com/dcdunkan/pastebin-bot
